svg.script: const test = async_test('getIntersectionList() with nested <svg>'); window.onload = test.step_func_done(() => { const testSVG = document.getElementById('askedForIntersection'); const r = testSVG.createSVGRect(); r.x = 0; r.y = 0; r.width = 100; r.height = 100; assert_equals(testSVG.getIntersectionList(r, testSVG).length, 2); });
